alert.note: Alert for Coffey; Jackson; Osage; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 3:30AM CST until March 05 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 024, 039, 055, AND 058... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM CST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 024, 039, 055, and 058. * WIND...Sustained south-southwesterly winds at 25-35 MPH with gusts up to 40-45 mph. Winds will shift to the west during the late afternoon. * HUMIDITY...Lowest RH values will be between 17-22 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
